description: Single storey rear extension and attached rear outbuilding.
decision_conditions: The proposal as described within the application would not constitute Permitted Development under Article 3 and Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, A.1 F (i), I, K (i) and Class E, E.1 (e)(ii) and E.1 (f) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).
